summary: An ordinance providing for the issuance and sale of municipal light and power revenue bonds in the principal amount of not to exceed $60,000,000 to finance, in part, the plan or system of additions and betterments to and extensions of the municipal light and power plant and system specified and adopted by Ordinance 91783, as amended; creating a bond redemption fund for the payment of the principal of and interest on such bonds and revenue bonds hereafter issued on a party therewith; and providing for the issuance of said bonds on a parity with those issued under Ordinance 86865 and like bonds hereafter authorized, as contemplated by Ch. 231, Laws of Washington 1953.
